title: Campaigns Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Humane Society International (Los Angeles, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Three interviews with HR, the head of the team, and a panel with the entire team. They took turns asking me questions. Quite a lengthy process. The whole team seemed great.
Interview Questions: Usual interview questions about my experience, my interest in the job and how I would achieve the goals.

title: Office Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Humane Society International
Interview Descriptions: It started with a 30 minute test to send a letter to a complaining client, then face to face interview for about 30 / 45 minutes with 2 of the senior staff
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Humane Society International?

title: Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Humane Society International (Washington, DC)
Interview Descriptions: My interview was great. Dr. Rowan was engaging and very knowledgeable about what he wanted; thought I'd be a great fit. Agreed to start out designing syllabi until an opening to teach became available
Interview Questions: How the HS can be more active internationally
